title: The creators of 3 Body Problem want to have ‘a back and forth’ with the book
description: Between its expanded, more ethnically diverse cast and its more advanced take on virtual reality gaming, Netflix’s new 3 Body Problem series unfolds in a very different way than the book it’s adapting. Cixin Liu’s novel is so dense and internal dialogue-driven that it was widely thought to be unadaptable for the screen.

description:

title: Ron DeSantis signs bill requiring parental consent for kids under 16 to hold social media accounts
description:
Florida Governor Ron DeSantis (R) just signed into law HB 3, a bill that will give parents of teens under 16 more control over their kids’ access to social media and require age verification for many websites.

The bill requires social media platforms to prevent kids under 14 from creating accounts, and delete existing ones. It also requires parent or guardian consent for 14- and 15-year-olds to create or maintain social media accounts and mandates that platforms delete social media accounts and personal information for this age group at the teen’s or parent’s request.

title: Apple, Meta, and Google targeted by EU in DMA non-compliance investigations
description:

title: Spotify adds video learning courses in latest experiment
description:
